Brisbon

Brisbon is a Dea of the Charis who is frequently aligned with holy warriors and good-aligned adventurers. Though he is frequently chastised by Hera and punished by the withholding of his borrowed power, he is quite direct in his interactions with mortals, prone to assigning them great quests, along with a gift of tangible power.

His usual symbols are the warhammer, and the mammoth.
